name: Nightlights
description:
This is Nightlights, a short puzzle game involving some flowers and some mushrooms.

  • Flowers like being lit up
  • Mushrooms prefer the dark
  • Two lights make a dark!

I made this for Trijam102, with the theme Contrast. It's a 3 hour game jam but took me 5 hours. Had a lot of fun though once I managed to get the lights working properly! It's a simple puzzle game about giving your plants and fungi the care they need so they can live in harmony.

The music is something I improvised in 2019 & it's not exactly a masterpiece, but I do want to highlight this is the first time I've published a game with music I did myself :)
